mapper.insert: insert into products (prd_name, price, inventory) values (#{prdName}, #{price}, #{inventory})
mapper.select: select prd_id prdId, prd_name prdName, price, inventory from products
mapper.update: update products set prd_name = #{prdName}, price = #{price}, inventory = #{inventory} where prd_id like #{prdId}
mapper.delete: delete from products where prd_id like #{prdId}
